软件包 org.athrun.android.framework.viewelement

接口摘要
ISlideableElement  
IViewElement Interface for all view elements.
IViewGroupElement Interface for Android ViewGroup.
 

类摘要
AbsListViewElement Base element for Android AbsListView.
CheckableElement Base class for CheckBox, RadioButton, ToggleButton.
ScrollViewElement Class for Android ScrollView.
SlideableElement Use this class, when you want to slide a view.
TextViewElement Class for Android TextView and its subclass.
ThirdPartyElement  
ViewCoordinate  
ViewElement Base class for all view elements.
ViewGroupElement Class for Android ViewGroup.
ViewUtils This class contains view methods.
